subtitle: This hot dessert is a delicious alternative to a traditional chilled fruit salad, combining a marvellous selection of fruits with a glorious coconut sauce.

method.text: Melt the coconut and butter together in a wok or large frying pan.
Stir fry all the prepared fruits except the banana for 2 min. Add the banana and stir fry for 1 min, making sure the mixture is coated well. Serve immediately.

title: Hot coconut fruit salad
